entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:56 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Periods of rain near Lake Ontario. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:42 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:42 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
